name: Magic Carpet Ride
summary: Inspired by Disney's Aladdin movie, you take control of Aladdin riding a carpet, dodging arrows and collecting hearts. Eric Carr, the programmer behind this game, ran out of space for hearts, but still arrived at a fun little endless dodging game that starts slow and quickly gets difficult.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Magic Carpet Ride - 2024 Basic 10Liner Contest Entry (Atari 8-bit)
